moblima.control

Class StaffController

  • Object
    • UserController
      • StaffController

  • public class StaffController
extends UserController
    Represents a controller for all staff module functions The staff module functions include login/logout Create/Update/Remove movie listings Create/Update/Remove cinema showtimes and the movies to be shown Configure system settings ï¼ˆticket prices and holidays)
    Author:
    SSP2 Team 1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StaffController.LoginFeedback
      Enumeration for different kinds of staff login feedback Including WRONGUSERNAMEPASSWORD, ALREADYLOGGEDIN and LOGINSUCCESS

      The list of all movie informations

      define the staff login username as moblima

      private StaffController()

      • initialize

        public void initialize(ArrayList<MovieInfo> movies,
                       ArrayList<Booking> bookings,
                       ArrayList<MovieShowing> movieShowings,
                       ArrayList<Date> holidays,
                       ArrayList<Cineplex> cineplexes)
        Initrialize all the data which staff may need to use/modify Including movie information, booking records movies to be shown, holiday, cinema and cineplex
        Parameters:
        movies - The list of all movie information
        bookings - The list of booking records
        movieShowings - The list of the information for movies to be shown
        holidays - The list of the holiday dates
        cineplexes - The list of cineplexes

      • login

        public StaffController.LoginFeedback login(String username,
                                           String password)
        Admin login needs to input username and password returns the login feedback if the user has already logined, return ALREADYLOGGEDIN if the password matches with username, login success else, login fails, the username or password are wrong
        Parameters:
        username - The username of staff
        password - The password of staff
        Returns:
        The login feedback
